Items.Title: Application no. 20075184 SCX, a proposed site for school facility consisting of four schools, one 573-seat intermediate/high school, two 549-seat high schools and one 544-seat charter middle school at Concourse Village West between E.153rd and E. 156th Street in Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
